reviews.review_msg: I took 4 classes with Yercich; Crim 131 (intro), 203 (history), 300 (writing; theory) and 319 (domestic violence). Easily the best and most caring prof I had at SFU because shes a good lecturer, gives helpful feedback, has reasonable assignments and is there for her students. Yercich's classes are reading and writing heavy but it won't kill you.
